Returns: the broadcast intent to fire or null if not available
getVoiceDetailsIntent(android.content.Co.Description: Returns the broadcast intent to fire with @B_android#content#Context#sendOrderedBroadcast_E@ to receive details from the package that implements voice search. This is based on the value specified by the voice search @B_android#app#Activity_E@ in @B_android#speech#RecognizerIntent#DETAILS_META_DATA_E@, and if this is not specified, will return null. Also if there is no chosen default to resolve for @B_android#speech#RecognizerIntent#ACTION_WEB_SEARCH_E@, this will return null. If an intent is returned and is fired, a @B_android#os#Bundle_E@ of extras will be returned to the provided result receiver, and should ideally contain values for @B_android#speech#RecognizerIntent#EXTRA_LANGUAGE_PREFERENCE_E@ and @B_android#speech#RecognizerIntent#EXTRA_SUPPORTED_LANGUAGES_E@. (Whether these are actually provided is up to the particular implementation. It is recommended that @B_android#app#Activity_E@s implementing @B_android#speech#RecognizerIntent#ACTION_WEB_SEARCH_E@ provide this information, but it is not required.)
getVoiceDetailsIntent(android.content.Co.FullName: public static final Intent getVoiceDetailsIntent (Context context)

ClassDesc: Constants for supporting speech recognition through starting an @B_android#content#Intent_E@
